name: LymphocyticChoriomeningitisTestsForLCMVAntibodyInCSFOrSerum
title: Lymphocytic Choriomeningitis (Tests for LCMV Antibody in CSF or Serum)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of LCMV Antibody in CSF or Serum.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: LCMV Antibody in CSF or Serum),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
